table.name: raw_non_domestic_epc_certificates_tbl
table.description: Non-domestic Energy Performance Certificate data from UK government register

column.name: LMK_KEY
column.description: Individual lodgement identifier. Guaranteed to be unique and can be used to identify a certificate in the downloads and the API.

column.name: ADDRESS1
column.description: First line of the address

column.name: ADDRESS2
column.description: Second line of the address

column.name: ADDRESS3
column.description: Third line of the address

column.name: POSTCODE
column.description: The postcode of the property

column.name: BUILDING_REFERENCE_NUMBER
column.description: Unique identifier for the property.

column.name: ASSET_RATING
column.description: Energy Performance Asset Rating. The CO₂ emissions from the actual building in comparison to a Standard Emission Rate. (kg CO₂/m²)

column.name: ASSET_RATING_BAND
column.description: Energy Performance Asset Rating converted into an energy band/grade into a linear 'A+ to G' scale (where A+ is the most energy efficient and G the least energy efficient)

column.name: PROPERTY_TYPE
column.description: Describes the type of building that is being inspected. Based on planning use class.

column.name: INSPECTION_DATE
column.description: The date that the inspection was actually carried out by the energy assessor

column.name: LOCAL_AUTHORITY
column.description: Office for National Statistics (ONS) code. Local authority area in which the building is located.

column.name: CONSTITUENCY
column.description: Office for National Statistics (ONS) code. Parliamentary constituency in which the building is located.

column.name: COUNTY
column.description: County in which the building is located (where applicable)

column.name: LODGEMENT_DATE
column.description: Date lodged on the Energy Performance of Buildings Register

column.name: TRANSACTION_TYPE
column.description: Type of transaction that triggered EPC. One of: mandatory issue (marketed sale); mandatory issue (non-marketed sale); mandatory issue (property on construction); mandatory issue (property to let); voluntary re-issue (a valid epc is already lodged); voluntary (no legal requirement for an epc); not recorded. Transaction types may be changed over time.

column.name: EXISTING_STOCK_BENCHMARK
column.description: The Benchmark value of existing stock for this type of building

column.name: BUILDING_LEVEL
column.description: Building Complexity Level based on Energy Assessor National Occupation Standards

column.name: MAIN_HEATING_FUEL
column.description: Main Heating fuel for the building is taken as the fuel which delivers the greatest total thermal output for space or water heating

column.name: OTHER_FUEL_DESC
column.description: Text description of unspecified fuel type if 'Other' is selected for Main Heating Fuel

column.name: SPECIAL_ENERGY_USES
column.description: Special energy uses discounted. This only appears on the Recommendations Report.

column.name: RENEWABLE_SOURCES
column.description: On-site renewable energy sources. This only appears on the Advisory Report.

column.name: FLOOR_AREA
column.description: The total useful floor area is the total of all enclosed spaces measured to the internal face of the external walls, i.e. the gross floor area as measured in accordance with the guidance issued from time to time by the Royal Institute of Chartered Surveyors or by a body replacing that institution. (m2)

column.name: STANDARD_EMISSIONS
column.description: Standard Emission Rate is determined by applying a fixed improvement factor to the emissions from a reference building. (kg CO₂/m²/year).

column.name: TARGET_EMISSIONS
column.description: Standard Emission Rate is determined by applying a fixed improvement factor to the emissions from a reference building. (kg CO₂/m²/year).

column.name: TYPICAL_EMISSIONS
column.description: Typical Emission Rate.

column.name: BUILDING_EMISSIONS
column.description: Building Emissions Rate. Annual CO₂ emissions from the building. Decimal (kg CO₂/m²)

column.name: AIRCON_PRESENT
column.description: Air Conditioning System. Does the building have an air conditioning system?

column.name: AIRCON_KW_RATING
column.description: Air conditioning System. Rating in kW

column.name: ESTIMATED_AIRCON_KW_RATING
column.description: Air Conditioning System. If exact rating unknown, what is the estimated total effective output rating of the air conditioning system

column.name: AC_INSPECTION_COMMISSIONED
column.description: One of:1=Yes, inspection completed; 2=Yes, inspection commissioned; 3=No inspection completed or commissioned; 4=Not relevant; 5=Don't know

column.name: BUILDING_ENVIRONMENT
column.description: Building environment which is taken as the servicing strategy that contributes the largest proportion of the building's CO₂ emissions.

column.name: ADDRESS
column.description: Field containing the concatenation of address1, address2 and address3. Note that post code is recorded separately.

column.name: LOCAL_AUTHORITY_LABEL
column.description: The name of the local authority area in which the building is located. This field is for additional information only and should not be relied upon: please refer to the Local Authority ONS Code.

column.name: CONSTITUENCY_LABEL
column.description: The name of the parliamentary constituency in which the building is located. This field is for additional information only and should not be relied upon: please refer to the Constituency ONS Code.

column.name: POSTTOWN
column.description: The post town of the property

column.name: LODGEMENT_DATETIME
column.description: Date and time lodged on the Energy Performance of Buildings Register.

column.name: PRIMARY_ENERGY_VALUE
column.description: Displayed on the non-domestic EPC as primary energy use (kWh/m2 per year)

column.name: UPRN
column.description: The UPRN submitted by an assessor or alternatively from the department’s address matching algorithm.

column.name: UPRN_SOURCE
column.description: Populated with the values "Energy Assessor" or "Address Matched" to show how the UPRN was populated.

column.name: REPORT_TYPE
column.description: Type of assessment carried out of the building. 102: assessment using the SBEM (Simplified Building Energy Model) tool for non-domestic (non-residential) buildings.
